REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0766 reute r f BC-AMVESTORS-<AVFC>-FILE 03-30 0050

TEXT.TITLE: AMVESTORS <AVFC> FILES FOR SHARE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: AmVestors Financial Corp said it has filed to offer 2,500,000 common shares through underwriters <Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co Inc> and Morgan Keegan Inc <MOR>. It said proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes. Reuter
